projects.title: SoundScholars
projects.description: A cognitive tutor that teaches novices musical rhythms in a fun and approachable way via learning pages and targeted exercises.

projects.title: SignSavvy
projects.description: Aimed at breaking down communication barriers for American Sign Language (ASL) users, SignSavvy is a web application that provides users with real-time translation of ASL.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Learn Astro and brush up on CSS while showcasing what I've been up to.
